thread.title: Poor Customer Service not expected from such a nice hotel in Times Square!
thread.title_full: Poor Customer Service not expected from such a nice hotel in Times Square! - Review of Row NYC Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sleepdeprived415
title: Poor Customer Service not expected from such a nice hotel in Times Square!
text: As stated earlier in review, Broken equipment in room kept my 13 daughter and I up all night.. The loud people coming home at night were more quiet than the Clanking heater! Told GM in morning who offered me to breakfast vouchers which we had already as did MANY guests. Not looking for a free night but being in sales myself, I know that to keep a customer and their recommendations a little added value goes a long way...
